testcase.name: To verify Book Store function
testcase.system-out: Given that I am logged in on the profile page...............................passed When I entered UserName "demoqaname12"......................................passed Then I entered Password "Demoqaabc@-1"......................................passed And I clicked on Login button...............................................passed And I click and expand Book Store Application...............................passed And I click Book Store......................................................passed And I search in the search bar "Git Pocket guide"...........................passed And I click on the book title 'Git Pocket Guide'............................passed And I click on the button 'Add To Your Collection'..........................passed And I click Ok when the website shows the message that the book is added to collection.passed And I click on Profile......................................................passed And I verify that the book title 'Git Pocket Guide' is there................passed
